loans.use: to buy basic grains, vegetables, oil, propane gas, pasta, sausages, and other supplies that she will use for making different menu dishes.

loans.name: Grupo Barrio El Capulin Group

texts.es:
“Grupo Barrio el Capulín” está conformado por personas amables y trabajadoras de una comunidad mazahua. La mayoría de los habitantes se dedica al cultivo de maíz, cría de borregos, vacas y pollos. Ahora que ha iniciado la primavera, las personas disfrutan de una vista agradable gracias al verde de los campos. 
Don Francisco es un hombre muy amable y alegre, tiene 51 años de edad, está casado con la señora Carmen quien se dedica a su hogar y son padres de 4 hijos, todos ellos independientes. 
Desde hace 8 años don Francisco se ha dedicado a la cría y engorda de borregos, los compra desde pequeños y los conserva durante seis meses para después venderlos a las personas de la comunidad que venden barbacoa, platillo tradicional de la región. Además, Francisco trabaja en el campo y en la construcción, mientras su esposa es quien lo apoya en el cuidado de los animales. 
Actualmente, Fancisco tiene 25 borregos en casa. “Nosotros aprovechamos el campo para no gastar en alimento, maíz o zacate. Los borregos comen el pasto que crece en las milpas”. Esta es la primera ocasión que Francisco solicita un préstamo a VisionFund y lo utilizará para comprar tres borregos más.
Todos los integrantes están muy contentos y agradecidos con su préstamo porque tendrán más capital para invertir en sus actividades. Ellos reconocen que tienen una gran responsabilidad con la institución y están comprometidos a hacer su mejor esfuerzo para realizar sus pagos puntualmente.  Su sueño es poder seguir incrementando sus ventas para mejorar su calidad de vida y la de sus hijos.

Los demás integrantes del grupo son Teresa y Benito quienes invertirán en pavos; Cecilia y Edelia, en borregos y Elizabeth, en jitomates.

*La fotografía fue tomada en las escaleras del municipio donde viven los integrantes, don Francisco es quien viste una camisa blanca*
texts.en:
The "Barrio de Capulin" group consists of friendly and hard-working people from a Mazahua community, where the majority of the inhabitants grow corn and raise sheep, cattle, and chickens. Now that spring has begun, the people enjoy a pleasant view thanks to the green of the fields.

Don Francisco is a very friendly and and happy man. He is 51 years old. He is married to Señora Carmen, who takes care of their home, and they are the parents of four children, all of them independent.

For 8 years Don Francisco has raised sheep. He buys them when they are young, and he keeps them for six months to later sell them to people in the community who sell barbeque, a traditional dish in the region. In addition, Francisco works in the fields and in construction, while his wife is the one who helps him with the care of the animals.

Now Francisco has 25 sheep at home. "We take advantage of the fields so that we don't buy food, corn, or fodder. The sheep eat the grass that grows in the fields." This is the first time that Francisco has applied to VisionFund for a loan, and he will use it to buy three more sheep.

All the members are very happy and grateful for their loans because they will have more capital to invest in their businesses. They recognize that they have a great responsibility to the institution and they are committed to making their best effort to make their payments punctually. Their dream is to be able to continue increasing their sales in order to improve their quality of life and that of their children.

The other members of the group are Teresa and Benito, who will invest in turkeys; Cecilia and Edelia, in sheep; and Elizabeth, in tomatoes.

The photograph was taken on the steps of the town where the members live. Don Francisco is the one who is wearing a white shirt.

loans.use: to buy three lambs

loans.name: Josias

texts.es:
Josias tiene 25 años de edad, tiene un hogar estable en el cual vive con su cónyuge, no tiene hijos, vive en el distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura y crianza de animales que se encuentra ubicada en la región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y engorde de aves de corral como pollos, gallinas, patos, entre otros, realiza esta actividad desde hace 2 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia y conocimiento del negocio. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de pollos pequeños para su posterior engorde y comercialización, con esto Josias incrementará su nivel de ventas lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en sus ingresos y mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Josias is 25 years old. He has a stable home where he lives with his spouse. He has no children. He lives in the district of Callayuc, a farming and livestock producing community located in the Cajamarca region of Peru's northern mountains.

He earns his living raising and fattening poultry like chickens, hens, ducks, and others. He has run this business for two years, so he has experience and business knowledge. He will use the loan to purchase chicks to later fatten and sell. With the loan, Josias will increase his sales, which will have a positive impact on his income and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy chicks to raise and sell

loans.name: Solidaridad Group

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SOLIDARIDAD, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia Olga continua con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas, la socia continua  vendiendo lo que son arroz, azúcar, leche entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas, golosinas entre otros.
Los demás socios se dedican al negocio de tienda de abarrotes, salón de belleza, restaurante.

La socia que sale en la foto adjunta pidio permiso para llegar tarde a la reunion por motivos de trabajo.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "Solidarity." The bank is located in the province of Cusco.

Bank member Olga continues with her grocery store business. She feels grateful for the loan offered and promises to make the established payments. She continues selling rice, sugar, and milk, among other products, to all her customers who make requests from her, since this is the way she is raising her family.

She is applying for a loan to purchase soft drinks and candies, among other items.

The other members work in grocery store, beauty salon, and restaurant businesses.

The member who is shown in the added photo asked permission to arrive late for the meeting because of work reasons.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks and candies, among other items.

loans.name: Dúo El Tablón De Bárcenas Group

texts.es:
Dúo el tablón de Bárcenas
Blanca de 57 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos quienes se dedican a su familia, inicio su negocio hace 13 años, actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa para dama en un local en el mercado central, solicita un crédito para invertir em mercaderia en ropa para vender en un segundo local que acaba de aperturar  y lo atiende una de sus hijas y así seguir trabajando para poder tener un techo propio.
texts.en:
El Tablón de Bárcenas duet
Blanca is 57 years old. She has 3 children who are committed to their family. She started her business 13 years ago. She is currently working selling ladies clothing in a sales stand at the local market. She is asking for a loan to buy clothing merchandise to sell in a second location she has just opened, and be able to continue working to have her own house.

loans.use: To buy new clothing for sale.

loans.name: Eli

texts.es:
Eli tiene 29 años de edad, tiene un hogar estable en el cual vive con su cónyuge y su menor hijo, su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio, está ubicada en el distrito de Callayuc, provincia y región de Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y engorde de aves de corral como pollos, pavos, gallinas, entre otros, realiza esta actividad desde hace 1 año por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan buenas referencias personales y laborales de el. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de pollos así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos, con esto Eli espera incrementar el stock de su negocio y ofrecer una mayor cantidad de animales a sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ventas y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Eli is 29 years old and has a stable home in which he lives with his partner and young son. His community is primarily engaged in agriculture, livestock, and commerce. It is located in the district of Callayuc province in the region of Cajamarca, in the northern highlands of Perú.

He makes a living raising poultry like chickens, turkeys, and hens, among others. He has been doing this activity for 1 year, so he has experience in this business and has regular customers who provide good personal and work references.

This loan will be used to purchase an increased quantity of chickens as well as balanced food to feed them. With this, Eli wants to increase the stock of his business and offer a better quantity of animals to his customers in order to increase his sales and thus improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to purchase an increased quantity of chickens and balanced food to feed them.

loans.name: Valentin

texts.es:
Valentin tiene 41 años de edad, es separado y tiene 01 hijo dependiente, vive en casa propia en el distrito de Cañaris, es un comunidad pequeña la cual se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Ferreñafe, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. En dicho distrito sus actividades principales son la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con cultivos propios de café. Adicionalmente se desempeña como peón agrícola en la zona realizando trabajos de cultivo de café y otros, cuenta con muy buenas refrencias personales y laborales en su distrito y con experiencia en la labor que realiza. El destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra de abono y fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de café y asi poder adquirir una utilidad aceptable para que mejore su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Valentin is 41 years old. He is separated and has one dependent son. He lives in his own house in the district of Cañaris. It is a small community which is located in the province of Ferreñafe, in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. The principal activities in this district are agriculture, commerce, and raising livestock.

He works in agriculture. He has his own plantings of coffee. In addition, he works as an agricultural laborer in the zone, doing work raising coffee and other crops. He has very good personal and work references in his district and has experience in the work that he does. 

The purpose of the loan will be to invest in the purchase of compost and fertilizer in order to give maintenance to his coffee crop and thus be able to acquire an acceptable income so that he can improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of compost and fertilizers to give maintenance to his coffee crop

loans.name: Nicholas

texts.en:
Nicholas is a single man. He describes himself to be God-fearing. 

Nicholas operates a retail business where he sells sand and ballast. He has been involved in this business for seven years. His business is located in a populated place. 

Nicholas will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of sand and ballast. His business goal is to have a wholesale business within five years. 

He hopes that in the future he will improve his living standards. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sand and ballast

loans.name: Tulgonoy

texts.en:
Tulgonoy is a bright woman. She was born in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1969. She lives in a village with her family; she is married and has two children.  

They live poorly and her son did not get education. He had to travel to Russia for work in order to help her family with their finances and to live better. Her husband is sick and cannot help his family. 

Tulgonoy has 27 years of practice doing business in agriculture. She plants potatoes, wheat and other agricultural products. She is planning to plant one hectare of potatoes and another hectare of wheat. 

Tulgonoy wants to have a good harvest this season and earn more money to live better. She tries her best to earn money and feed her family. She is asking for a loan from Kiva lenders to buy potato seeds, natural chemicals and fertilizers. She will plant and hopefully have a good harvest earning money to live better. 

She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds of potato, natural chemicals and fertilizers

loans.name: Ninoska Diana

texts.es:
Ninoska es una joven mujer de 19 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de bioquímica. 
Ella es inteligente, responsable, comprometida, constante, dulce, cariñosa, sensible y sincera. Sus estudios lo realiza en la universidad pública en la zona Central, caracterizada por el comercio en todas las áreas de clima frio y seco con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 4-16 grados centígrados.
Ninoska es de tez morena, cabello negro largo peinado a la moda, su lengua materna es el Aymará el cual ya no utiliza porque estudia y vive en la ciudad. Su vida la realiza junto a sus padres que trabajan como transportista y su madre como costurera. Viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con los servicios de energía eléctrica, agua potable y alcantarillado. Ella cursa la carrera de Bioquímica y se encuentra en 1 año de 5 años que dura la carrera; disfruta ayudando a las personas, le gusta entender los síntomas de enfermedad, su carácter es de servicio. “estudio bioquímica porque me apasiona el conocimiento de los seres vivos, ya que se identifica y se actúa sobre cada uno de los elementos químicos que lo conforman, modelan y afectan para bien o para mal...” comenta. La ventaja de su carrera es que cuenta con un amplio mercado por desarrollar, la desventaja son los libros y materiales de estudio que tienen un gran valor económico. Su sueño es ser profesional para conseguir un buen empleo y ayudar a sus padres. Ella desea invertir en sus estudios mediante la compra de una computadora portátil para finalizar su carrera. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que se dedica al estudio profesional. 
Es por esos motivos que Ninoska solicita un préstamo para comprar una computadora portátil para poder estudiar y terminar su carrera profesional.
texts.en: Ninoska is a 19 year old young woman. She is single, with no children, and is currently studying Biochemistry. She is intelligent, responsible, committed, constant, sweet, warm, sensitive, and sincere. She studies at the public university in the central zone, characterized by trading in all areas. Its climate is cold and dry, with a temperature which fluctuates between 4-16 degrees Celsius. Ninoska is dark complected, with stylish, long black hair. Her native tongue is Aymara, which she does not utilize anymore because she lives and studies in the city. She lives with her parents. Her father works as a driver and her mother as a seamstress. They live in their own house, built of brick and cement with a corrugated metal roof, with electricity, running water, and sewage. She is enrolled in the first year of a 5-year Biochemistry program. She enjoys helping people, she likes to recognize the symptoms of illnesses, and she is a service oriented person. "I study Biochemistry because I am passionate about living things. I like to identify and study each of the manifestations of the chemical elements that form them, model them, and affect them for good or bad..." she states. The advantage of her career is that she has a wide market to develop, and the disadvantage is that the books and study materials are expensive. Her dream is to be a professional to get a good job and help her parents. She wants to invest in her studies by buying a laptop and finish her career. This is the first loan with the institution in her first year of her academic profession. Thus, Ninoska is asking for a loan to buy a laptop to be able to study and finish her professional career.

loans.use: To buy a laptop to be able to study and finish her professional career.

loans.name: Marine

texts.en:
Marine is 49 years old and she lives with her husband in Gavar city of the Gegharkunik region. Marine has two sons and both of them are already married but they live with their families in the Russian Federation. 

Marine and her beloved husband are engaged in farming, and here Marine has cows, bulls, heifers, calves and piglets. Marine sells milk, macun (the national dairy-product) and meat (beef and pork) from her farm. 

As Marine says, she dreams of the day that her sons and their families will be back in their city, and together they will develop their farm and make it bigger. 

Marine asks for this loan of 700,000 Armenian drams (AMD) as she wants to buy fodder for her farm cattle, since the pastures are still poor with grass and her cattle lack fodder.

loans.use: to buy fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: Dúo Brisas De Bárcenas Villa Nueva1 Group

texts.es:
Dúo Brisas de Bárcenas Villa Nueva1
Raúl es soltero, tiene 25 años de edad se dedica a la venta de leña la cual inicio hace cuatro años para apoyar a su madre, con los ingresos del hogar y que sus hermanos puedan ir a la escuela, hoy en día el necesita el crédito para comprar un camión de leña ya que al comprar por  mayor las ganancias son mejores, anhela formar su familia y darles lo mejor que pueda le gusta mucho su trabajo, en el cual atiende todos los días de la semana.Espera que le puedan ayudar con el crédito solicitado.
texts.en:
Dúo Brisas de Bárcenas Villa Nueva1

Raul is single, 25 years old, and makes a living selling firewood, which he started 4 years ago to support his mother with the household income and so that his brothers could go to school. 

Now he needs the loan to buy a wood truck since buying wholesale the profits are better. He aspires to form his family and give them the best that he can. He likes his work a lot, work that he tends to every day of the week. He hopes that you can help him with the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy firewood to sell

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Ldyia is married with two children and one goes to school. She also takes care of additional family members. She resides in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees. 

Ldyia has a retail shop and has been in this business for six years. She works in her shop seven days out of every week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenges include seasonality, transportation and defaulters. 

Ldyia has applied for a loan of 1,600,000 Uganda shillings (UGX) from MCDT-SACCO to buy bags of sugar, cartons of salt, flour, boxes of soap, cooking oil, bags of beans, and rice. 

She is aspiring to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy bags of sugar, cartons of salt, flour, boxes of soap, cooking oil, bags of beans, and rice

loans.name: Silver

texts.en:
Silver is married, has eight children and describes himself as positive-minded. He runs a business in which he transports customers using his motorcycle (he also sells charcoal). He works in a busy area where his primary customers are locals. Insufficient capital is his biggest challenge to developing his business.

Silver is applying for a 100,000 KES loan through SMEP to buy a better motorcycle for his business. He hopes that in the future he will educate his family and create employment.

loans.use: to buy a better motorcycle for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy clothes to sell (second hand)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy potato seedlings and fertilizer for her land

loans.name: Gustavo De Jesus

texts.es:
Gustavo es un humilde trabajador residente en el municipio de Zaragoza con una vida colmada de sueños, esperanzas y los mejores deseos para su familia. 

Es padre de 1 hija por la cual siempre ha tenido el valor y responsabilidad de responder para que su vida sea la mejor.
Hoy en día se gana la vida con la elaboración y venta de salpicón y jugo natural, estas bebidas las transporta en una carretilla y las vende de manera ambulante.

Le dedica 12 horas diarias a su negocio.
De las principales dificultades que debe enfrentar en su trabajo son las fuertes lluvias y el alto costo de las materias primas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una moto para adaptarla a su carretilla y así poder transportarse de manera más fácil, así podrá tener los ingresos suficientes para continuar con su negocio y sostener a su familia.
texts.en:
Gustavo is a humble worker, resident of the Zaragoza municipality, with a life full of dreams, hopes, and best wishes for his family.

He is the father of one daughter, for whom he always has had the strength and responsibility to respond so that her life is the best.

Now he earns a living making and selling salpicón and fresh juice. He transports these drinks in a trolley and he sells them in a mobile manner.

He dedicates 12 hours a day to his business.

Some of the main difficulties he has to face in his work are the strong rains and the high cost of the raw materials.

He is asking for a loan to buy a motorcycle to attach to his trolley and in that way be able to transport himself in an easier manner. That way he will be able to have sufficient income to continue with his business and support his family.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to attach it to his trolley and in that way be able to transport himself in an easier manner.

loans.name: Ruzan

texts.en: Ruzan is from Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region. She already has two successful deals with Kiva and hopes for a third one. This time she wants to be supported in farming and agricultural activities in which she is engaged with her parents and sister. At the farm, Ruzan takes care of cows, calves, pigs, and chickens. With her mother she sells milk, cheese, mea,t and eggs. Land cultivation is not hard work for Ruzan, and with her father they manage to have a good harvest of potatoes both for sale and for family use. Ruzan will be thankful if Kiva lenders provide her with a loan that she will use for the purchase of potato seedlings, fertilizer, and diesel fuel for her land, as well as animal fodder for her farm cattle.

loans.use: to purchase potato seedlings, fertilizer, and diesel fuel for her land, as well as animal fodder for her farm cattle

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.en: Mavluda is a generous woman. She was born in a village in the northern part of Tajikistan in 1984. She is living in a beautiful area where flowers and trees blossom in the spring. She is married and has four children. She is agrarian and keeps cattle and agricultural products. She heard an advertisement about IMON trainings and was interested in participating. At training, she learned about the secrets and how to benefit from keeping cattle and planting potatoes. After getting needed information and knowledge, she decided to get ahead and do her business well. She asked for a loan from IMON and KIVA lenders to buy fertilizers and have a good harvest. It is hard for her to work and feed a family alone because her husband is not working. She hopes to be supported and have a good harvest to live better.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers

loans.name: Marita

texts.en:
Marita hails from the town of Talibon, Bohol. She runs a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various commodities like canned goods, biscuits, soft drinks, noodles, seasonings, and toiletries.  She is a 35-year-old married woman with four children. Her oldest child is 13 and the youngest is 4. Her husband works as a welder.
She has requested a loan in the amount of 15,000 PHP to buy supplies like assorted canned goods, rice, and soft drinks. These are very essential tools in augmenting her business. It will keep her store full of stock and at the same time attract more buyers to shop. In this way, she can expand her business while at the same time provide her children with healthy diets.
Marita hopes that she can be a successful business woman someday.

loans.use: to buy supplies like assorted canned goods, rice, and soft drinks

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es:
Con su sonrisa y gran corazón, Marleny ha tenido una gran acogida en su barrio desde que abrió una restaurante en su casa hace 7 años con gran esfuerzo y con un deseo en su mente, el de salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar insumos e ingredientes como harina, maíz, carne, pollo, aliños y un molino eléctrico.

Con estos ingredientes e insumos podrá continuar cocinando y preparando las delicias que con sus manos trabajadoras ha venido ofreciendo y sirviendo.
Su principal dificultad es el Alto costo de los insumos.

Apoya a Marleny con su negocio y has que su vida sea mejor con un préstamo!
texts.en:
With her smile and her big heart, Marleny has become very popular in her neighbourhood since she opened a restaurant in her house 7 years ago, which she did through hard work and one desire in mind - to get ahead and improve her family's quality of life.

The loan she is requesting is to buy consumables and ingredients such as flour, corn, meat, chicken, seasoning and an electric mincer. With these ingredients and consumables she will be able to continue cooking and preparing the culinary delights that her hard-working hands concoct and serve. Her main difficulty is the high cost of consumables. Support Marleny in her business and help improve her life with a loan!

loans.use: to buy consumables and ingredients such as flour, corn, meat, chicken, seasoning and an electric mincer.

loans.name: Jose Arbey

texts.es:
El señor José es un hombre emprendedor y aplicado, desde hace 2 Meses comenzó con una legumbrería que hasta ahora le ha dado muy buenos resultados. 
El vive en el municipio de Urrao con su madre a la cual manifiesta que tiene mucho que agradecerle en la vida.

El trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 5:00 Pm atendiendo un número de cliente medianamente alto.

El solicita un préstamo para comprar productos a granel como papa, repollo, Cebolla, entre otros y de éste modo satisfacer los deseos de los clientes que le piden estos productos.

Esta ayuda le permitirá inyectar variedad a su negocio y le brindara la jugosa oportunidad de mejorar sus ventas y sus ingresos familiares.
texts.en:
Señor José is an enterprising and diligent man. Two months ago he started up a vegetable store that so far has produced very good results. He lives in the municipality of Urrao with his mother for whom he says he has much to thank in life.

He works from Monday to Saturday from 8am to 5pm serving a a fairly high number of customers. He is requesting a loan to to buy produce in bulk such as potatoes, cabbages, onions and others in order to satisfy customer demand for this kind of produce. This assistance will enable him to introduce variety into his business and will give him the lucrative opportunity to improve his sales and family income.

loans.use: to buy produce in bulk such as potatoes, cabbages, onions and others in order to satisfy customer demand.

loans.name: Danys Raul

texts.es:
Danys es un hombre de 31 años de edad, que desde hace 1 año comenzó a trabajar una tienda de abarrotes que un familiar le cedió para que la trabajara y generara ingresos para sustentar los gastos del hogar.
Este negocio lo atiende todos los días de 7 am a 8 pm y, a pesar de la competencia que existe en el sector, ha obtenido buenos resultados, generando ingresos suficientes para que a su esposa y a sus 2 hijos no les haga falta nada.

El crédito que solicita con la Corporación Interactuar es un apoyo para comprar surtido al por mayor como mecato, lácteos, galletería, granos, entre otros, esto le permitirá ofrecer mayor variedad de productos para satisfacer las necesidades inmediatas de sus clientes, aumentando las ventas e ingresos que recibe por su labor.

Danys, con su espíritu de superación y las ganas de salir adelante con su familia, lo impulsan a seguir luchando y avanzar para cumplir el sueño de adquirir una casa propia, en la que pueda disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida en compañía de su familia y brindar una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Danys is a 31-year-old man, who a year ago started working in a grocery store that a family member passed on to him so that he could work and generate income to help pay the household costs. He works in the business every day from 7am to 8pm and, despite the competition in this sector, he has had good results, generating sufficient income so that his wife and two children lack for nothing.

The loan that he is requesting with Corporación Interactuar is for help in buying wholesale produce such as snacks, dairy products, biscuits, basic staples and others. This will enable him to offer a greater variety of products to satisfy the immediate needs of his customers, increase his sales and the income he makes from his work. 

His will to overcome and his keenness to get ahead for himself and his family are what drive him to carry on fighting and progressing to achieve the dream of acquiring his own house, in which he would have a better quality of life with his family, and being able to afford to pay for an education for his children.

loans.use: to buy wholesale provisions such as snacks, dairy products, biscuits, basic staples and others

loans.name: Arturo De Jesus

texts.es:
Arturo, de 51 años, inicio con un negocio de artes graficas y publicidad hace aproximadamente 17 años con el afán de buscar una actividad que le generara ingresos para poder sobrevivir.

En el momento, encuentra su motivación para trabajar incansablemente en sus dos hijos y es así como desea ofrecerles lo mejor para su vida y desarrollo.
Hoy en día sus hijos tienen 26 y 23 años y se han convertido en la alegría de este hombre trabajador.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos como rollos de cinta, papel de imprenta y tintes.

Con este préstamo podrá sostener su negocio y a su familia brindándoles una calidad de vida mejor.

Apoya a Arturo con un préstamo para que pueda continuar con su actividad!
texts.en:
Arturo, 51, began his graphic arts and publicity business approximately 17 years ago in an effort to earn an income to survive.

His motivation to work tirelessly comes from his two children since he wants to give them the best he can for their life and development.

His children are now 26 and 23 and they have become this working man's source of happiness.  He is requesting a loan to buy supplies such as masking tape, printing paper and inks.  With the loan he will be able to maintain his business and give his family a better quality of life.

Please help Arturo so he can continue with his business.

loans.use: To buy supplies like masking tape, printing paper and inks.

loans.name: Sandra Yesenia

texts.es:
Sandra tiene gran experiencia en el área de panadería, hace 1 año inicio con su propia panadería que hasta ahora le ha generado muy buenos resultados. Aprendió a través de un amigo quien le enseño el oficio.

Siempre ha preferido trabajar independiente, trabaja todos los días durante 10 horas

Actualmente necesita un auxilio para comprar pipetas de gas industrial, insumos, sillas y mesas para su negocio. 

El préstamo le permitirá trabajar en unas mejores condiciones y podrá garantizar la calidad de sus preparaciones.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran panadería que surta diferentes tiendas.
Con esta ayuda podrá trabajar de una manera más organizada y con mejor atención.
texts.en:
Sandra has vast experience in the baking business.  A year ago she started her own bakery and it has been turning a good profit so far.  She learned the trade from a friend of hers.

She always has preferred to work independently, and every day puts in ten hours.  

Now she is in need of a loan to buy industrial gas flasks, supplies, tables and chairs for her business.  The loan will allow her to work in better conditions and guaranteee the quality of her products.

Her greatest goal is to have a larger bakery that sells to different shops.  With this help she will be able to work in a more organized fashion and provide better service.

loans.use: To buy industrial gas flasks, supplies, tables and chairs for her business.

loans.name: Maria Nuvia

texts.es:
Maria, de 53 años de edad, durante su vida productiva ha trabajado como vendedora en una tienda de abarrotes, la misma que hoy en día es de su propiedad.

Allí trabaja sola todos los días, logrando generar los ingresos suficientes para solventar las necesidades básicas de su hogar. 
Su tenacidad, visión, perseverancia y optimismo le han permitido sobrepasar diversos obstáculos que se le presentan, especialmente con la gran cantidad de competidores que existen en el sector; sin embargo, ha sabido manejar la situación y ha aprovechado la ventaja de que el establecimiento ya cuenta con una amplia trayectoria en el mercado.

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito con el que desea comprar surtido al por mayor Como carne, víveres y legumbres, así podrá abastecerse lo suficiente para satisfacer la demanda. 

Maria, con el sueño de ampliar su negocio, se visualiza en el momento que el establecimiento esté bien posicionado en el mercado y así poder acreditarlo para que crezca y perdure en el tiempo, mejorando la calidad de vida y ofrecer un mejor bienestar y educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria, 53, has worked all her life in a grocery store which now belongs to her.

She works every day and is able to generate enough income to cover basic household necessities.  Her tenacity, vision, perseverence and optimism have allowed her to overcome the diverse obstacles she has been faced with, especially the great number of competitors who exist in her sector.  She has known how to manage the situation and take advantage of the fact that the establishment already has made great strides in the market.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy a variety of wholesale goods such as meat, groceries and legumes.  This is to have enough stock on hand to meet demand.

With a goal of expanding her business, Maria imagines the time when her store is in a good position in the market, gaining recognition so she can grow a long-standing business.  This will improve the quality of life and education she can offer to her children.

loans.use: To buy a variety of wholesale goods such as meat, groceries and legumes to satisfy demand.

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana es una bella mujer de 36años de edad, madre de un hijo de 16 años, criada con unas muy buenas costumbres, desde el colegio desarrollo una gran pasión y gusto por todo lo relacionado con la belleza.  

Inicio su etapa productiva realizando cursos y capacitaciones, hasta que un día se aventuró y decidió ir en busca de su propia clientela montando un negocio de salón de belleza en su hogar. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de  un sillón para manicure y pedicura, además de surtido pues también quiere vender productos para complementar sus servicios, como crema de manos, gel, productos capilares, tinturas para cabello, barnices, también realizará algunas mejoras locativas.

El crédito para ella será muy importante pues terminara de consolidar su empresa completándola con todos los insumos necesarios para operar y ofrecer cualquier servicio que lleguen a solicitarle.

Su sueño es que su empresa progrese de la mano de Interactuar y tenga muchos clientes.
texts.en:
Diana, 36, is a beautiful woman with a 16-year-old son.  She was raised with good values and in her school days started developing a great passion for everything related to beauty.

She started her activity taking courses and training, until one day she decided to go off in search of her own customers and opened a beauty salon in her home.

She is requesting a loan to buy a salon chair for manicures and pedicures, as well as a variety of products to sell in addition to her services.  These include hand creams, gel, hair products, hair color, and nail polish.  She also wants to upgrade her salon.

The loan is very important to her because it will help finish consolidating her business.  It will give her all the supplies she needs to operate and offer any service requested of her.

Her dream is for her company to prosper with the help of Interactuar, and to have many customers.

loans.use: To buy a salon chair, hand creams, gel, hair products and hair color.

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
Alejandrina es una mujer de 55 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene hijos independientes,  y su negocio es la venta de papa.
Ella es emprendedora, constante, paciente, comprensiva, solidaria, fuerte, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la localidad de Sacaba; situada en la afueras de la ciudad a un distancia de 13 kilómetros, donde se realiza el comercio legal de la hoja de coca y dónde se practican deportes extremos como parapente.
Alejandrina es de tez morena como la tierra, ojos pardos como la noche, cabello negro largo lo usa trenzado, baja estatura, su forma de vestir es tradicional (pollera, manta y sombrero), su lengua materna es el Quechua que se habla en el lugar y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la comparte con su pareja que trabaja como constructor (sus hijos son independientes y tienen sus familias), viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y que cuenta con energía eléctrica y agua de pozo extraída mediante una bomba eléctrica. Su negocio es la venta de papa, las más comunes son; ‘Puka Waycha’, ‘Aurora’, ‘Palta Chola’, ‘Puyjuni Imilla’ que son variedades resistentes a enfermedades como el tizón tardío de la papa. Actividad que realiza de forma ambulante, transportando sacos de sus tubérculos en un carrito de 2 ruedas y visitando las diferentes ferias del lugar. “La papa ha sido cultivada por miles de años por culturas ancestrales andinas, dando  lugar a una gran variedad de papas adaptadas a diferentes microclimas de Los Andes...” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que existe gran demanda, la desventaja es que no cuenta con un puesto fijo de venta. Su sueño es tener agua potable en su hogar, ella desea realizar la instalación de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería para no tener que usar agua sucia de pozo. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Alejandrina solicita un préstamo para la instalación de agua potable en su cocina, baño y lavandería; para dejar de usar agua sucia.
texts.en:
Alejandrina is 55 years old and lives with her partner; the couple’s children are now independent. Alejandrina has a business selling potatoes.

Alejandrina is enterprising, tough, patient, understanding, caring, strong, responsible and hard-working. Her business is in the town of Sacaba, 13 kilometres from Cochabamba. Here people legally trade coca leafs and practise extreme sports, such as paragliding.

Alejandrina is dark skinned, has eyes as dark as night, and black hair that she wears tied back. She is short, and wears traditional dress (a skirt, blanket and hat). Alejandrina’s first language is Quechua, which she speaks locally, and she also speaks Spanish in daily life and at work.

Alejandrina shares her life with her partner, a builder. (Alejandrina’s children are independent and have their own families). The couple lives in a house that they own, built with bricks and cement and topped with a tin roof. The house has electricity and water extracted from a well with an electric pump. 

Alejandrina has a business selling potatoes, the most common varieties of which are: 'Puka Waycha', 'Aurora', 'Palta Chola', and 'Puyjuni Imilla’. These varieties are resistant to diseases. Alejandrina works as a street vendor, carrying bags of potatoes on a two-wheeled cart and visiting the different local markets.

She says, “The potato has been grown for thousands of years by ancient Andean cultures. This lead to a the potatoes adapting to different microclimates in the Andes".

The advantage of Alejandrina’s business is that there is high demand for her products; the downside is that she does not have a fixed stall. 

Alejandrina’s dream is to have running water at home in her bathroom, kitchen and laundry room so as not to have to use dirty well water. This is Alejandrina’s first loan with the Emprender in the 10 years that she has had her business. 

For these reasons, Alejandrina is applying for a loan in order to stop using dirty water and have running water in her kitchen, bathroom and laundry room.

loans.use: to stop using dirty water and have running water in her kitchen, bathroom and laundry room.

loans.name: Alma Libia

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajadora, así es Alma, una mujer guerrera que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Turbo, donde se gana la vida con la preparación de alimentos variados como almuerzos y desayunos en un pequeño restaurante ubicado en su casa.
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 4 horas.

Sus alimentos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su restaurante porque saben que podrá comer de una manera deliciosa.

Alma ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar ingredientes e insumos para sus recetas como harina, arroz, carne, entre otros; adicional desea realizar mejoras asu cocina.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Alma is a humble, hard-working, determined woman who has spent much of her life raising her children.  She lives in the municipality of Turbo where she earns a living preparing a variety of meals such as lunch and breakfast in a small restaurant located in her house.  She works alone, four hours every day.

Her dishes are well-known among neighbors who visit the restaurant knowing they can enjoy a delicious meal.

Alma has decided to improve her business and increase sales.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy ingredients and supplies for her recipes, such as flour, rice, meat and other goods.  She also wants to renovate her kitchen somewhat.

The loan will allow her to grow her business and earn enough income to continue supporting her family and the business.

Please help Alma make her dreams come true.

loans.use: To buy ingredients and supplies for her recipes, such as flour, rice, meat, etc.  She also wants to fix up her kitchen.

loans.name: Gloria Franceny

texts.es:
Gloria en su búsqueda por un futuro prometedor y unas buenas oportunidades para salir adelante, decidió reiniciar un negocio que según él le dará todo eso que siempre ha soñado.

Montara de nuevo su negocio de tienda de abarrotes en su casa en el municipio de Sonsón, con el cual planea sostener a su familia compuesta por sus dos hijos.

Su principal dificultad es la falta de capital para trabajar.

Para lograr esto necesita la ayuda de un préstamo con la Corporación Interactuar que le permita comprar un enfriador, estanterías, vitrinas y surtido de productos básicos de la canasta familiar como abarrotes, granos, galletas y otros alimentos para abastecer y reiniciar su negocio.

Apoya a los sueños emprendedores de una madre soltera Colombiano con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
In her search for a promising future and good opportunities to get ahead, Gloria has decided to re-start her business. According to her, this will give Gloria everything that she has ever dreamed of.

Gloria will re-open her grocery shop at her house in the municipality of Sonsón. She plans to use the business to support her family of two children.

Gloria’s main difficulty is that she does not have capital.

In order to set up her business, Gloria needs the help of a loan from Interactuar. This will allow her to buy a cooler, stands, and display cases, as well as groceries, grains, biscuits and other foodstuffs to stock up and re-start her business.

Give a loan and support the enterprising dreams of a single mother in Colombia today!

loans.use: to buy a cooler, stands, and display cases, as well as groceries, grains, biscuits and other foodstuffs to stock up and re-start her business.

loans.name: Helen

texts.es:
Helen es una mujer de 26 años de edad, vive con su pareja, tiene 3 hijos de 6, 4 y 1 año de edad, y su negocio es la venta de comida rápida a la hora de la cena.
Ella es buena madre, generosa, amable, optimista, solidaria, responsable y muy trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la zona ‘Mutualista’ un área céntrica donde conviven lado a lado edificios y oficinas de todas las áreas. De clima cálido tropical, con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 21-32 grados centígrados.
Helen es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello negro largo lo usa amarrado estilo cola de caballo, baja estatura, complexión física mediana, su lengua materna es el Guaraní que habla en familia y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su vida la realiza en compañía de su pareja que trabaja como comerciante y con sus hijos; el mayor estudia en la escuela y los 2 menores aún no se encuentran en edad escolar, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de comida rápida a la hora de la cena; en un carrito hamburguesero que consta de 2 freidoras, un sartén y una parrilla (todo calentado por medio de una garrafa de gas), cada día al caer la noche alista su puesto de venta al aire libre en la calle, rodeada sólo por una docena de sillas y un par de mesas. Las comidas que vende son del tipo rápida, como; hamburguesas, pollo frito, papas fritas y carne a la parrilla, todo se acompaña con yuca y con refresco de somó. “inicie mi negocio por la necesidad de trabajar y cuidar a mis hijos que son pequeños…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que lo realiza cerca a su hogar y no debe transportarse muy lejos con sus alimentos, la desventaja es que sólo puede trabajar por las noches porque de día debe cuidar a sus hijos. Su sueño es abrir un restaurante, ella desea ampliar su negocio mediante la compra de mesas, sillas e utensilios de cocina para atender a mayor número de clientes. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 1 año que se dedica a esta actividad de forman independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Helen solicita un préstamo para equipar su negocio comprando; mesas, sillas e utensilios de cocina, para atender a más clientes y poder cuidar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Helen is a 26 year old woman. She lives with her spouse and she has three children, aged 6, 4 and 1. Her business is selling fast food at dinner time.  

She is a good mother, generous, kind, optimist, supportive, responsible and very hardworking. She has her business in ‘Mutualista’, a central area where buildings and offices exists side by side everywhere. It has a warm, tropical climate with a temperature that varies between 21-32 degrees celsius.  

Helen has dark skin, brown eyes, and long, black hair that she wears in a ponytail, short stature, and a medium build. Her mother tongue is Guaraní, which she speaks in her family, and she speaks Spanish in the general culture and at her business. She lives her life with her spouse, who works as a merchant, and with her children. The oldest goes to school and the two youngest are not school aged yet. They live in their own home built of brick and cement with a sheet metal roof. It has potable water, electricity and plumbing. Her business is selling fast food at dinner time from a hamburger cart that has two fryers, a burner and a grill (all of it is heated by a gas tank). Every evening she gets her open air spot ready in the street, surrounded only by a dozen chairs and a couple of tables. The food she sells is fast food, such as: hamburgers, french fries, and grilled meat. Everything comes with yucca and somó juice. “I started my business out of a need to work and care for my children, who are small.…” she remarks. The advantage of her business is that she does it close to her home and she doesn't have to go very far with her food. The disadvantage is that she can only work at night because she has to care for her children. Her dream is to open a restaurant. She wants to expand her business by buying tables, chairs and kitchen utensils to serve a greater number of customers. This is her first loan cycle with the institution during the year she has worked at this activity independently.  

These are the reasons that Helen is asking for  loan to equip her business by buying tables, chairs, and kitchen utensils to serve more customers and be able to care for her children.

loans.use: to equip her business by buying tables, chairs and kitchen utensils to serve more customers and be able to care for her children.

loans.name: Luz Dary

texts.es:
Luz es una mujer dedicada a su familia y a su labor. Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido salir adelante, sobrepasando diversos obstáculos que se le han presentado. 

Desde hace 7 años inició su propio negocio, un salón de belleza que ubicó en un local en la ciudad donde reside, además, también presta el servicio a domicilio, según el requerimiento de sus clientes. 

Trabaja todos los días durante 8 horas 
Esto le ha permitido generar los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y a solventar las necesidades de su único hijo. 

El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de insumos al por mayor como tratamientos capilares, shampoo, acondicionador, esmaltes para uñas, entre otros, esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y prestar un servicio más completo a sus clientes, de una manera más ágil y eficiente; lo que beneficiará el margen de utilidades que percibe por su labor. 

Luz manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder continuar con su labor, acreditar y fortalecer bien su negocio para lograr ser más competitiva en el mercado y así tener la capacidad para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Luz is a woman who is dedicated to her family and her work. Her tenacity and perseverance have allowed her to get ahead, overcoming diverse obstacles that have come up.   

Seven years ago, she started her own business, a beauty salon located in the place where she lives in the city. In addition, she also does housecalls as needed by the customers.    

She works every day for 8 hours. This has allowed her to generate enough resources to help her husband with the financial responsibility of the home and cover the needs of her only child.  

The loan she is asking for will be invested in buying materials wholesale, such as hair treatments, shampoo, conditioning, nail polish, and more. This will allow her to continue with her work and offer a more complete service to her customers in more agile and efficient way. This will benefit her profits margin from her work. 

Luz says that her biggest wish is to be able to continue with her work, and to accredit and fortify her business in order to be more competitive in the market and have the capacity to offer a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to buy materials wholesale such as hair treatments, shampoo, conditioner, nail polish, and more.

loans.name: Jose Pastor

texts.es:
El señor José es un hombre emprendedor trabajador, desde hace 10 años comenzó con una legumbreria que hasta ahora le ha dado muy buenos resultados. 

El vive en el municipio de Medellín solo.

El trabaja de lunes a domingo durante 18 horas con el fin de continuar atendiendo un número de cliente medianamente alto.

El solicita un préstamo para comprar productos a granel como arroz, frijol, lentejas, legumbres, entre otros y de éste modo satisfacer los deseos de los clientes que le piden estos productos y que lo conocen por su amabilidad y compromiso.

Esta ayuda le permitirá inyectar variedad a su negocio y le brindara la jugosa oportunidad de mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
José is an entrepreneurial and hardworking man. He opened a grocery store ten years ago, and so far he has had good results. José lives alone, in Medellín. He works eighteen hours, from Monday to Sunday, serving a moderate number of customers.

José is requesting a loan to buy products in large quantities, such as rice, beans, lentils, and legumes. He will be able to fulfill his customers’ demands. His customers prefer him because he is kind and committed to his work.

This loan will help José to offer a wider variety of products, and represents a good opportunity to improve his sales.

loans.use: to buy products in large quantities, such as rice, beans, lentils and legumes.

loans.name: Ana Carina

texts.es:
Ana, de 27 años, inicio con un negocio de alquiler de lavadoras hace unos meses con el afán de buscar una actividad que le generara ingresos para poder sobrevivir con su familia.

En el momento, encuentra su motivación para trabajar incansablemente en sus tres hijos y es así como desea ofrecerles lo mejor para su vida y desarrollo.

Hoy en día sus hijos tienen 8,7 y 8 años y se han convertido en la alegría de esta mujer trabajadora.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de una lavadora nueva y la adecuación de los pisos de su negocio.

Con este préstamo podrá sostener su negocio y a sus hijos brindándoles una calidad de vida mejor.

Apoya a Ana para que pueda continuar con su actividad!
texts.en:
Ana is 27 years old. She started her business renting out washing machines a few months ago in order to have an activity that generates income to survive with her family.  

At this time, she finds motivation to work tirelessly in her three children and this is how she wants to offer them the best for their life and development. Today her children are 8, 7 and 8, and they have become the happiness of this hardworking woman.  

She is asking for a loan to buy a new washing machine and to fix the floor of her business. With the loan, she will be able to sustain her business and offer her children a better quality of life. 

Support Ana so she can continue with her activity!

loans.use: to buy a new washing machine and to fix the floors in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy manioc

loans.name: Fatoumata's Group

texts.fr:
Mise en place depuis le 08 Décembre 2012 ce banc villageois est composé de femmes du groupement du village qui ont adhéré dans le programme afin de rendre les activités dans le petit commerce plus rentables.

Madame Fatoumata, âgée de 29 ans (assise à l'extreme droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants dont 01 garçon et 02 filles. Elle s'active dans la vente de produis alimentaires qu'elle achete dans les marchés hebdomadaires pour le revendre en détail dans son village.

Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter 02 sac de sucre à 14000f le sac et 75 cartons de thé  à 200f le carton.

Ses bénéfices lui permettront de développer son commerce et d’aider son mari pour les dépenses journalières.
texts.en:
This Banc Villageois was set up on 8th December 2012 and is made up of women from the village association, who have joined the program so they can make their small trading businesses more profitable. 

Fatoumata, who is 29 years old (sitting on the far right of the photo with her hand raised) is the star borrower of the group. She is married and mother to three children: one boy and two girls. She sells groceries which she buys at the weekly markets to sell on a retail basis in her village.

With her new loan, she is planning to buy two sacks of sugar at 14,000 francs per sack and 75 cartons of tea at 200 francs the carton.

Her profits will enable her to build up her business and help her husband with the daily outgoings.

loans.use: to buy two sacks of sugar at 14,000 francs per sack and 75 cartons of tea at 200 francs per carton.

loans.name: Rondro Josiane

texts.fr:
41ans, mariée,et mère de 4 enfants,Rondro Josiane vend en détail et en balle des casquettes et des différentes sortes de chapeaux fripe. Elle exerce cette activité depuis qu'elle a eu son premier enfant: 20 ans. Elle, son mari ainsi que ses 2 premiers enfants s'entraident dans l'exercice de cette activité. C'est une famille très solidaire et débrouillarde. Son but est d'ouvrir un 2ème point de vente d'ici peu pour développer l'activité et augmenter le revenu afin de subvenir aux besoins de la famille, à la scolarisation des 2 petits (7 et 5 ans) et surtout de réaliser le rêve d'avoir leur propre maison car actuellement la famille habite encore dans une maison à location. 
Le crédit va donc être utilisé pour acheter des balles de casquettes et chapeau, c'est une activité encore rarement pratiqué.
texts.en: Rondro Josiane is 41 years old, married and mother to four children. She sells on a retail basis bales of caps and different sorts of used hats. She has been carrying out this activity since she had her first child, who is 20 years old now. She, her husband and their two eldest children help out with this business. They are a very united and resourceful family. Her aim is to open a second sales point in the near future so she can build up the business and increase her income. This will enable her to provide for the family's needs and the education of the two youngest children (seven and five years old), but above all to realise her dream for the family to have its own house, since at the present they live in a rented house. The loan will thus be used to buy bales of caps and hats; this is a rare business.

loans.use: to buy bales of caps and hats.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.en:
Mahbuba is a young and bright woman. She was born in northern part of Tajikistan in 1973. She is married and has two children. Her husband is an emigrant and works in Russia. 

She had difficulties when she started to do business. She tried to find a good ways to do a business, but she had no money and it was not easy to get a loan from banks. She started with buying and selling textiles; Mahbuba was a retailer. Then she saved up money and rented a place to sell her goods by herself. Now she has a permanent clients and good business. 

Mahbuba needs support because her husband is in Russia and it is hard for her to feed and keep her family by herself. She is planning to buy more textiles for the new season to enlarge her assortment. It would help her to have more clients and earn more to live better. She is asking a loan from Kiva lenders to buy these textiles. 

She awaits your kindness and hopes to be supported.

loans.use: to buy a new collection of textiles for her business so she can live better.

loans.name: Mueni

texts.en:
Mueni is a married woman. She has 6 children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a retail business where she sells vegetables and fruits. She has been involved in this business for 13 years. Her business is located in a shopping centre and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of enough funds. 

She will use the Kes 30,000 loan to buy more stocks of fruits and vegetables. Her business goal is to have a big business within 5 years. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to expand the business. 

This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Mueni's previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: buy more stocks of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Jose Fredy

texts.es:
Fredy, de 35 años de edad, estudio hasta octavo grado, está casado y su esposa se dedica a las tareas domesticas, tiene cuatro hijos y están estudiando.

Fredy, se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenia 20 años de edad; aprendió este oficio junto a sus padres y su hermano mayor, hoy en la actualidad trabaja junto a sus hijos.

Con el crédito que está solicitando Fredy, pretende comprar insumos agricolas para terminar de preparar su cultivo de maíz.

Fredy, sueña con poder vender a buen precio el elote, para obtener buena ganancia y así llevar el sustento a su familia.- También sueña con poder construir su casa de ladrillo y comprar ganado de repasto.
texts.en:
Fredy, 35 years old, went to school up to the eighth grade, is married, and his wife takes care of the household tasks. He has four children and they are students.

Fredy has worked in agriculture since he was 20 years old. He learned this work alongside his parents and his older brother. Currently, he works with his children.

With the loan that Fredy is requesting, he plans to purchase agricultural supplies to finish preparing his corn crop. 

Fredy dreams of being able to sell the corn at a good price, to get good earnings and in this way to sustain his family. He also dreams of being able to build a brick house and to purchase cattle.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies to finish preparing his corn crop.

loans.name: Deiber

texts.es:
Deiber, en su incansable búsqueda de una mejor vida y una mejor estabilidad económica, inicio con un negocio de barbería prestando su servicio en su casas o a domicilio en el municipio de Medellín, un municipio donde el empuje y verraquera es un referente muy importante de los habitantes de este municipio llamado también “La Ciudad de la Eterna Primavera”.

El trabaja todos los días en horarios muy variados y siempre está ocupado en algún servicio ya que es muy solicitado por su buen trabajo.

Solicita un aliento económico para realizar la compra de cuchillas, gel, e instrumentos de trabajo que le hacen falta.

Hoy en día se siente feliz por el buen trabajo que hasta ahora ha realizado y que le ha permitido gozar de un trabajo más estable.

Con un crédito podrás apoyar a Deiber a continuar con su proyecto de vida!¡
texts.en:
Deiber, in his tireless search for a better life and better economic stability, began with a barber shop business offering his services in customers' homes in the municipality of Medellín, a municipality where drive and energy is a very important model for the inhabitants of this municipality which is also called "The City of Eternal Spring."

He works every day in a varying schedule and is always busy with some service since he is highly requested due to his good work.

He asks for economic support to purchase razor blades, gel, and work tools that he is lacking. 

These days, he is happy for the good work that he has done to date and that it has allowed him to enjoy a more stable job.

With a loan, you will be able to help Deiber to continue with his life project!

loans.use: to purchase razor blades, gel, and work tools that he is lacking.

loans.name: Denis Del Carmen

texts.es:
Denis, una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Sincelejo desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas por encargo. 

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Denis y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados.

Denis desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de algunos utensilios de cocina y compra de insumos como carne, harina, sal, arroz, papa, entre otros, para continuar realizando sus recetas.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia, oportunidad que le brinda la Corporación Interactuar con todo su compromiso.
texts.en:
Denis is a humble and hard-working woman who has dedicated a large part of her life caring for her children. She lives in the municipality of Sincelejo, where she works spectacularly in the kitchen and her business is preparing take-out meals. 

She sells these foods primarily to the neighbors in the sector who know Denis's flavorings and know that they will always get delicious and very well-prepared foods. 

Denis wants to increase her food sales and wants to work in a more comfortable way. For this reasons, she asks for a loan to purchase some cooking utensils and purchase supplies such as meat, flour, salt, rice, potatoes, and more, to continue making her dishes. 

This loan will allow her to get her business ahead and, so, to get the income necessary which will give her the opportunity to continue supporting her family, an opportunity that Corporación Interactuar offers her with her complete commitment.

loans.use: to purchase some cooking utensils and to purchase some supplies such as meat, flour, salt, rice, potatoes, and more, to continue making her dishes.

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es:
Leonardo es un humilde trabajador residente en el municipio de Sincelejo con una vida colmada de sueños, esperanzas y los mejores deseos para su familia. 
Es padre de 4 hijos por los cuales siempre ha tenido el valor y responsabilidad de responder para que su vida sea la mejor.

Hoy en día se gana la vida con la venta de frutas, estos alimentos los transporta en una carretilla y los vende de manera ambulante.
Le dedica 12 horas diarias a su negocio.

De las principales dificultades que debe enfrentar en su trabajo son los largos desplazamientos hasta su sitio de trabajo y la inseguridad del area.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de frutas como manzanas y uvas al por mayor para tener una muy buena venta, así podrá tener los ingresos suficientes para continuar con su negocio y sostener a su familia.
texts.en:
Leonardo is a humble worker, resident of the municipality of Sincelejo, with a life full of dreams, hopes, and the best desires for his family. He is the father of 4 children for whom he has always had the value and responsibility of responding so that their lives are the best.

These days, he earns his living selling fruit. He transports these foods in a cart and sells them as a street vendor. He works 12 hours daily at his business.

Among his the primary difficulties that he has to confront in his work are the long distance to the place where he works and the lack of safety in the area. 

He asks for a loan to purchase fruit such as apples and grapes in bulk to have very good sales, and in this way be able to have sufficient income to continue with his business and sustain his family.

loans.use: to purchase fruit such as apples and grapes in bulk to have very good sales and in this way be able to have sufficient income to continue with his business.

loans.name: Jairo Antonio

texts.es:
Jairo, de 27 años de edad, vive en el caserío el chorizo, está soltero y vive con sus padres, se dedica a la agricultura, no pudo seguir estudiando debido a los escasos recursos de su familia.

Jairo, tiene 7 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, por lo cual conoce a perfección el trabajo que realiza.

El crédito que está solicitando es para pagar el alquiler del terreno y comprar cinco sacos de abono y pagar la mano de obra que le ayudará a sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz.

El sueño de Jairo, es poder obtener buenas ganancias al final de esta cosecha, para sembrar más maíz y ajonjolí, luego pretende casarse y formar su hogar.
texts.en:
Jairo, 27 years old, lives in the village of El Chorizo. He is single and lives with his parents. He works in agriculture. He couldn't continue with his education due to the family's lack of resources.

Jairo has been working in agriculture for 7 years, for which he knows perfectly the work that he does. 

The loan that he is requesting is to pay the rent on the land and purchase five sacks of manure and pay for the labor which will help him plant 7,000 square meters of corn.

Jairo's dream is to be able to get good earnings at the end of this harvest to plant more corn and sesame, later he plans to marry and make his home.

loans.use: to pay rent on the land and purchase five sacks of manure and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy grains

loans.name: Sadraddin

texts.en:
Sadraddin is married and has three children. Sadraddin is an IDP (Internally Displaced Person), a refugree from the town of Fuzuli city but now he lives in the Fuzuli region together with his family. He loves his family very much does everything for them. 

Sadraddin has been in the animal breeding business and loves his job. He sells milk and milk products (yogurt, cheese, etc.) which are made by Sadraddin and his wife. This is Sadraddin's third loan; he has closed all of them on time. 

Now he wants to buy more cows. Therefore he needs a loan amount of 1,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). 

He thankful for this loan from the Kiva organization and lenders. 

In the future, to increase his business, Sadraddin wants to build a new stall for cows.

loans.use: to buy cows to increase business; in the future he wants to build a new stall for the cows

loans.name: Karisa

texts.en:
Karisa is a married man. He has two children, ages 3 years and 8 years. He describes himself to be honest. 

He operates a restaurant. He has been involved in this business for two years. His business is located in a populated place, and his primary customers are good. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient capital. 

He will use the Kes 40,000 loan to buy ingredients for preparing food. 

His business goal is to expand business within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will have better living standards. 

This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for preparing food

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is married and has four children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees. 

For the past five years, she has operated a cashew nuts selling business, selling at the market to her neighbours and town dwellers. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

Rehema is requesting a loan to purchase six sacks of cashew nuts. 

She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase six sacks of cashew nuts

loans.name: Eleonora's Group

texts.en:
Eleonora, pictured above, has six children and is always described as a very hardworking individual, which is why she was selected to become the group leader of her group. Eleonora is representing her group of 13 farmers in Kakamega South District, and is happy to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

Eleonora has been a farmer for 19 years and, in order to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods, she decided to join the One Acre Fund program this season. Her loan will not only include farming inputs but also a solar light, which she is very happy to be getting as that means she will now have light during dark hours for her children to be able to study. 

With the profits from this coming season, Eleonora is planning to send her children to school.

A total of eight acres will be planted by Eleonora's Group, and between them they will receive a total of five solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Bahaddin

texts.en:
Bahaddin is married and has a lovely family with two daughters  who help Bahaddin with his business. His wife is a housewife. His family is an IDP (Internally displaced Persons) from Fuzuli city and they live in the  Fuzuli region. 

Bahaddin  breeds animals and raises them to sell in the bazaar.  This is Bahaddin's  third loan, all were successfully repaid.  He requests 1,300 AZN to buy calves. 

Bahaddin thanks the Kiva organization and lenders for their help.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Edward's Group

texts.en:
Edward is a 41-year-old proud father of five children. He is a group leader, often described as a very hardworking individual, and is representing his group of 15 farmers in Kakamega South District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Edward has noticed that he has been able to consistently feed his family.

Edward described his harvest as excellent last year, but believes he can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. He is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because he will now be able to have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study. 

With the profits from this season’s harvest, he plans to send his children to school.

With this loan, Edward’s Group will be able to plant a total of 9.75 acres of land and purchase a total of 7 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Annastacia

texts.en:
Annastacia is married and has one child.  She operates a retail business selling fruits and vegetables, which she has been doing for five years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. 

Annastacia requested her first loan from SMEP Microfinance Bank for 20,000 KES, which she will use to buy more stock of fruits and vegetables. Her business goal is to have a wholesale shop within five years.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Majnuna

texts.en:
Majnuna is a clever, single woman who is living in the northern part of Tajikistan with her parents. Majnuna is a responsible, active, and generous person. 

She helped her parents with agriculture when she was a child and gained experience raising livestock. They are poor and her father goes to Russia to work and earn money. 

She graduated the secondary school with excellence and entered university. She does not have the money to pay tuition fees and decided to ask IMON  for student support. She was informed about KIVA and decided to request a loan from IMON. She will use the loan to pay university tuition.

loans.use: to pay a tuition.

loans.name: Linet's Group

texts.en:
Linet has been a farmer for 19 years and leads a  group of 12 farmers in Kakamega South District. She is 41 years old, married, and has 10 children.

Linet  thinks of herself as a very hardworking individual. She has  worked  with One Acre Fund since 2014 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers. She says that being part of the One Acre Fund community has meant that she has been able to consistently feed her family. Linet plans to use the profits from this coming season to invest in a business.

Linet’s Group will receive inputs to cultivate 7 acres of land and receive a total of 4 solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Mombasa Group

texts.en:
Michael is a single man with two daughters who attend school.  He has painted buildings for ten years and works from 8am to 6pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be Michael's 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loan to buy paints, brushes, and oil.  He has successfully repaid  his loan.  He used the profit to pay school fees and cover household expenses.  

He will use this loan to  buy high quality paint, brushes, and  oil to make his painting more advanced.  He dreams of becoming a famous painter.

loans.use: to buy high quality items for his painting business.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is married with two children, all attend school. She takes care of additional family members. She has sold charcoal at the market, working seven days a week, for 6 years. 

She requests 1,100,000 UGX  from MCDT – SACCO to buy bags of charcoal. Her major business challenges include seasonal conditions and transportation. Her goal  is to diversify and sell fruit and vegetables which are in high demand. 

She lives in her own house where the family has access to electricity and but not running water. Her monthly expenses include rent and school fees.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose has operated a motorized tricycle  transportation service for 4 years.  He is a 38-year-old married man with five dependents. His oldest child is 10 and the youngest is 7 months old. He lives in Talibon, Bohol.

He has requested  a loan to purchase motor cycle spare parts and repair the cycle. These tools are needed to continue the operation of his business. He will be  able to provide his customers with quality services and  increase his income to meet his financial needs. He could provide his family with nutritious meals and  good living conditions.  

Jose hopes that his tricycle will be properly repaired for the welfare of his passengers and safety.

loans.use: to purchase motor cycle spare parts and pay repair costs.

loans.name: Milka

texts.en:
Milka is a married woman with 5 children. She describes herself as humble and operates a retail business to sell milk. She has been involved in this business for 6 years. Her business is located in a good area and her primary customers are local people. 

Her biggest business challenge is transportation. She will use 30,000 KES to buy milk. This is her third loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. Previous loans were  successfully repaid.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: Cyrus

texts.en:
Cyrus is married and has two children. He operates a retail business selling shoes, which he has been doing for seven years. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. 

Cyrus requested his second loan from SMEP Microfinance Bank for 50,000 KES, which he will use to buy more stocks of shoes. His business goal is to own a wholesale shop within five years.

loans.use: to purchase shoes

loans.name: Zainab

texts.en:
Zainab is a married woman with  four children, all attend school. She owns a house without  electricity and running water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

Zainab operates a market stall to sell vegetables. She is challenged by the  high cost of transportation to her place of operation. 

She will use 40,000 KES  to purchase green vegetables, tomatoes, and onions. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase green vegetables, tomatoes, and onions.

loans.name: Fedha's Group

texts.en:
Fedha has been a farmer for 50 years and is proud to represent his 16-member group in Kakamega South District. He is 81 years old, married, and has 9 children.
